list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a flattened structure of a higher plant, typically green and blade-like, that is attached to a stem directly or via a stalk. Leaves are the main organs of photosynthesis and transpiration.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: many of the trees had lost their leaves

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thing that resembles a leaf in being flat and thin, typically something that is one of two or more similar items forming a set or stack.
(of a plant, especially a deciduous one in spring) put out new leaves.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: many plants need a period of dormancy before they leaf and flower
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nhiều cây cần một khoảng thời gian ngủ đông trước khi chúng lá và hoa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: turn over (the pages of a book or the papers in a pile), reading them quickly or casually.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he leafed through the stack of notes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta lá qua đống ghi chú
